scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara and Nerissa Ravencroft perform the song 'GETCHA!'.
Transition and introduction of the next guest, Kazusa Kohaku.
Takanashi Kiara and Kazusa Kohaku perform the song 'Beat Eater'.

subtitles.original: Now I can finally open my eyes.

subtitles.original: 気付いたんだ今は Rolling

subtitles.original: 分かってんだ 見せられたって
subtitles.english: I know, even if I'm shown.

subtitles.original: 雑の罠に嵌まるつもりなっとんない
subtitles.english: I have no intention of falling into a sloppy trap.

subtitles.original: 当たり前が止まんない 怖いな
subtitles.english: The obvious won't stop, it's scary.

subtitles.original: もどかしさも正味だい
subtitles.english: The frustration is also real.

subtitles.original: HELLO 湧いてくる 束の間のジプシン
subtitles.english: Hello, a fleeting gypsophila that wells up.

subtitles.original: そこからはどう見えてる？ Tell me, jumping
subtitles.english: How does it look from there? Tell me, jumping.

subtitles.original: どれだけ僕を弄ってくれるの？
subtitles.english: How much will you mess with me?

subtitles.original: 干渉して 心を加速して
subtitles.english: Interfere, accelerate my heart.

subtitles.original: 始まりはどこから？
subtitles.english: Where does it start?

subtitles.original: それも容赦ないから
subtitles.english: Because that's also relentless.

subtitles.original: 体を支配している 満ち足りた様
subtitles.english: The satisfied appearance that dominates the body.

subtitles.original: ダーリンダーリン 貪って NEXT TIME
subtitles.english: Darling, darling, devour it, next time.

subtitles.original: マニーマニー 化けるのさ
subtitles.english: Money, money, I'll transform.

subtitles.original: 何がどうなったって不思議じゃない
subtitles.english: No matter what happens, it's not a mystery.

subtitles.original: 振りを増し 糊塗になって 響き出す
subtitles.english:
Increasing the pretense, becoming a cover-up,
it starts to resonate.

subtitles.original: COME OVER 消えて 噛み噛み
subtitles.english: Come over, disappear, biting biting.

subtitles.original: あくまで踊っていたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to dance to the end.

subtitles.original: 気付いたんだ今は Rolling
subtitles.english: I've realized, right now I'm Rolling.

subtitles.original: 止まりたくないんだのみ
subtitles.english: I only don't want to stop.

subtitles.original: ヤバい 何となくのみ
subtitles.english: Oh no, just somehow.

subtitles.original: 魅了されてるのみ
subtitles.english: I'm just fascinated.

subtitles.original: 予想より不便で長い航路
subtitles.english: A route longer and more inconvenient than expected.

subtitles.original: 不確かなものに囲まれてんだあれ
subtitles.english: Look, I'm surrounded by uncertain things.

subtitles.original: そこら中に転がってる堕落
subtitles.english: Corruption rolling around everywhere.

subtitles.original: 妄想だって思いのほか重要
subtitles.english: Delusions are more important than one might think.

subtitles.original: 心に差か 放れた振る舞い
subtitles.english: Behavior detached from the heart.

subtitles.original: 早まったのさ引くに引けないよそう
subtitles.english:
It was premature,
an expectation I can't back out of.

subtitles.original: こんな手に入れて妥協を打ち込め
subtitles.english: Getting this in hand, hammer in the compromise.

subtitles.original: 姿を映して危なかった盤
subtitles.english: The disc that was dangerous, reflecting the figure.

subtitles.original: アイアイアイ 道は分かれたんだ
subtitles.english: Ai ai ai, the paths have diverged.

subtitles.original: アイアイアイ それも遠くから
subtitles.english: Ai ai ai, even that from afar.

subtitles.original: アイアイアイ 全て間違いじゃない
subtitles.english: Ai ai ai, everything is not a mistake.

subtitles.original: アイアイアイ 哀しみに込めた
subtitles.english: Ai ai ai, infused with sadness.

subtitles.original: ダーリンダーリン 万更でもない
subtitles.english: Darling, darling, not all that bad.

subtitles.original: マニーマニー 塗り直すのさ
subtitles.english: Money, money, I'll repaint it.

subtitles.original: 今になればいつだって構わない
subtitles.english: By now, I don't care when it is.

subtitles.original: 色を買い 糊塗になって 溢れ出す
subtitles.english: Buying colors, becoming a cover-up, it overflows.

subtitles.original: COME OVER 消えて 噛み噛み
subtitles.english: Come over, disappear, biting biting.

subtitles.original: まだまだ足りてないみたい
subtitles.english: It seems it's still not enough.

subtitles.original: 重なり合う 光だ 耳寄り側
subtitles.english: Overlapping light, on the edge of a tip.

subtitles.original: どこにも消えないでほしい
subtitles.english: I want it to never disappear.

subtitles.original: 留まる濃い 深い重心だより
subtitles.english: Staying dense, relying on a deep center of gravity.

subtitles.original: 傷付くことも有る
subtitles.english: There are also times when things get hurt.

subtitles.original: ダーリンダーリン 貪って NEXT TIME
subtitles.english: Darling, darling, devour it, next time.

subtitles.original: マニーマニー 退屈なのさ
subtitles.english: Money, money, it's just boring.

subtitles.original: 何がどうなったって不思議じゃない
subtitles.english: No matter what happens, it's not a mystery.
